sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • {props.home}
  • {props.about}
) } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string, home: PropTypes.string, about: PropTypes.string } Navbar.defaultProps = { home: 'Link for homepage not added', title: 'Set title here', about: 'About text here' };
